product_name: Powertraveller Power Monkey Explorer Luminous Solar Battery Charger
long_description: The Powertraveller Power Monkey Explorer Luminous Solar Battery Charger collects energy from the the sun's rays during the day, then glows so you can find it with ease in your pack or at night.
short_description: The Powertraveller Power Monkey Explorer Luminous Solar Battery Charger collects energy from the the sun's rays during the day, then glows so you can find it with ease in your pack or at night.
